description: Number of partitions of n into parts 7k+2 or 7k+5.
formula: a(n) ~ exp(2*Pi*sqrt(n/21)) / (4 * 21^(1/4) * cos(3*Pi/14) * n^(3/4)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015
mathematica: nmax = 100; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Product[1/((1 - x^(7k+2))*(1 - x^(7k+5))), {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 26 2015 *)
